border--l-solid.title: Solid left border
border--l-solid.description: Gives the left border a solid line.

border--l-dashed.description: Gives the left border a dashed line.

border--l-dotted.description: Gives the left border a dotted line.

border--l-double.title: Double left border
border--l-double.description: Gives the left border a double line.

border--l-groove.title: Groove left border
border--l-groove.description: Gives the left border a groove.

border--l-ridge.title: Ridge left border
border--l-ridge.description: Gives the left border a ridge.

border--l-inset.title: Inset left border
border--l-inset.description: Gives the left border an inset.

border--l-outset.title: Outset left border
border--l-outset.description: Gives the left border an outset.
